comment: I'm a junior at KSU and Professor Stevens is by far one of the best professors I've had. Attendance is mandatory as he passes out an attendance sheet at the beginning of each class but I missed two sessions and still received a 100 for attendance. His quizzes and tests are lecture depending so make sure you go! Overall very entertaining lectures!

Great professor who gives real life stories as examples in class since he is an actual attorney. You won't be punished for skipping class but I recommend to go because you get attendance points, tons of extra credit, and understand the material better. Exams are online and open note on D2L. Easy weekly online hw assignments.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures--EXTRA CREDIT
